sentence.Network_en: We encouraged them to rehearse what they were going to say.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们鼓励他们默述一下他们要说的内容。

sentence.Network_en: Rehearse and role-play the interview with a friend beforehand.
sentence.Network_cn: 事先和朋友通过角色扮演排练一下面试。

sentence.Network_en: Anticipate any tough questions and rehearse your answers.
sentence.Network_cn: 预先考虑可能遇到的各种棘手问题，并且自己练习回答。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'repeat aloud'): from Old French rehercier, perhaps from re- 'again' + hercer 'to harrow', from herse 'harrow' (see hearse)

entry.tran: 排练，演练，预演(戏剧、舞蹈或音乐作品)
entry.def: When people rehearse a play, dance, or piece of music, they practise it in order to prepare for a performance.

example.ex: A group of actors are rehearsing a play about Joan of Arc...
example.tran: 一群演员正在排演一出关于圣女贞德的戏。

example.ex: Tens of thousands of people have been rehearsing for the opening ceremony in the workers' stadium...
example.tran: 数万人一直在工人体育馆为开幕式进行排练。

entry.def: If you rehearse something that you are going to say or do, you silently practise it by imagining that you are saying or doing it.

example.ex: Anticipate any tough questions and rehearse your answers...
example.tran: 预先考虑可能遇到的各种棘手问题，并且自己练习回答。

example.ex: We encouraged them to rehearse what they were going to say.
example.tran: 我们鼓励他们默述一下他们要说的内容。

entry.def: If you rehearse something, you repeat it in detail.

example.ex: Yesterday's speech to the Scottish party conference rehearsed the arguments again.
example.tran: 昨天在苏格兰党人会议上的演讲中又一次重复了这些观点。

auth_sentence.content: He and his colleagues would rather play cards than rehearse.
auth_sentence.res_content: He and his colleagues would rather play cards than rehearse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He and his colleagues would rather play cards than rehearse.

auth_sentence.content: It was time to rehearse the concert aria.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was time to rehearse the concert aria.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was time to rehearse the concert aria.

auth_sentence.content: Words learned by rote a parrot may rehearse.
auth_sentence.res_content: Words learned by rote a parrot may rehearse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Words learned by rote a parrot may rehearse.

sentences.en: He rose at 7 a.m.,rehearsed all day and appeared in a play at night.
sentences.cn: 他七点钟起床,排了一天戏,晚上演出。

sentences.en: He had all the words he needed typed out and well rehearsed.
sentences.cn: 他把需要说的话都打了出来，并且反复练习。

sentences.en: I was tempted to stay and hear this superb orchestra rehearse.
sentences.cn: 我真想留下来听这支高超的管弦乐队排练。

sentences.en: The actors began to rehearse a few scenes.
sentences.cn: 演员们开始排练剧中的几场戏。

sentences.en: I’m sure his remarks were rehearsed, not impromptu.
sentences.cn: 我肯定他的话是预先想好的, 不是即席讲的。

sentences.en: She mentally rehearsed what she would say to Jeff.
sentences.cn: 她在心里复述着要对杰夫说的话。
